name: Shine Dark - Reddit Theme (Requires Shine Bright)
description:
Shine Dark - Reddit Theme for Shine Bright

Features:
1. More space to posts/pics in Split view mode
2. Better color scheme
additional_info:

1. SHINE for reddit https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/shine-for-reddit/acoiihnnfofnpbnofdcgcapbjlcopifa?hl=en

3. I Recommend the Reddit Enhancement Suite
